0:
[INPUT]
    Name               tail
    Tag                kube.*
    Path               /var/log/containers/*.log
    Parser             cri
    DB                 /var/log/flb_kube.db
    Buffer_Chunk_Size  512KB
    Buffer_Max_Size    5M
    Rotate_Wait        30
    Mem_Buf_Limit 5MB
    Skip_Long_Lines On
    Refresh_Interval   10

[FILTER]
    Name                kubernetes
    Match               kube.*
    Merge_Log           On
    Merge_Log_Trim      On
    Keep_Log            Off
    K8S-Logging.Parser  On
    K8S-Logging.Exclude Off
    Annotations         Off
    Labels              On
[FILTER]
    Name          nest
    Match         kube.*
    Operation     lift
    Nested_under  kubernetes
    Add_prefix    kubernetes_
[FILTER]
    Name          nest
    Match         kube.*
    Operation     lift
    Nested_under  kubernetes_labels
    Add_prefix    kubernetes_labels_

[OUTPUT]
    Name                    gelf
    Match                   kube.*
    Host                    graylog.${SECRET_PRIVATE_DOMAIN}
    Port                    12201
    Mode                    udp
    Gelf_Short_Message_Key  message

[PARSER]
    Name        json
    Format      json
    Time_Key    time
    Time_Format %d/%b/%Y:%H:%M:%S %z
    Time_Keep   Off
[PARSER]
    Name docker
    Format json
    Time_Key time
    Time_Format %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%L
    Time_Keep Off
[PARSER]
    # http://rubular.com/r/tjUt3Awgg4
    Name cri
    Format regex
    Regex ^(?<time>[^ ]+) (?<stream>stdout|stderr) (?<logtag>[^ ]*) (?<message>.*)$
    Time_Key    time
    Time_Format %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%L%z

[OUTPUT]
    Name http
    Match kube.*
    Host {{ .Release.Name }}-victoria-logs-single-server
    port 9428
    compress gzip
    uri /insert/jsonline?_stream_fields=stream,kubernetes_pod_name&_msg_field=log&_time_field=date
    format json_lines
    json_date_format iso8601
    header AccountID 0
    header ProjectID 0

[FILTER]
    Name kubernetes
    Match kube.*
    Merge_Log On
    Keep_Log On
    K8S-Logging.Parser On
    K8S-Logging.Exclude On
[FILTER]
    Name                nest
    Match               *
    Wildcard            pod_name
    Operation lift
    Nested_under kubernetes
    Add_prefix   kubernetes_

- job_name: node-exporter
  honor_labels: true
  scrape_interval: 1m
  scrape_timeout: 10s
  metrics_path: /metrics
  scheme: http
  static_configs:
    - targets:
        - "10.5.0.10:9100"
